pkgmetadata.longdescription: Random Forest Cluster Analysis // Tools to perform random forest consensus clustering of different data types. The package is designed to accept a list of matrices from different assays, typically from high-throughput molecular profiling so that class discovery may be jointly performed. For references, please see Tao Shi Steve Horvath (2006) doi:10.1198/106186006X94072 Monti et al (2003) doi:10.1023/A:1023949509487 .
